name: VirtuaCreature
description: The ultimate monster simulation! Train, feed, and battle with your own personal creature - Treat it well, and you'll see it evolve!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP (32-bit) Processor: 2.33 Ghz or faster x86-compatible processor Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Video Memory Storage: 80 MB available space
